messages.content: Hello, I have some questions about the upcoming medical examinations for Monstarlab Inc. employees.
Sure, I'm here to help. What would you like to know?
Who is eligible for the medical checkup?
All employees who are employed and covered by social insurance as of the date of the medical checkup are eligible. Part-time workers are also eligible if they are enrolled in social insurance.
What are the different menus for the medical checkup?

For employees aged 34 and up, the basic medical checkup is recommended. For employees aged 35 and above, the health insurance designated checkup is recommended. Additionally, female employees aged 30 and above can also opt for the women's medical checkup, which includes tests for cervical cancer, ultrasound, and mammogram.
When can employees consult for the medical checkups?
Employees can consult for the medical checkups starting from August 2023.
Where will the medical checkups be conducted?
The medical checkups will be conducted at the Shibuya Sakura Juji Clinic. You can find more information on their website: https://www.sj-shibuya-clinic.jp/. You can also reach them at 03-6854-1515.
What should employees do for schedule changes or additional options?

Employees should directly contact the clinic for any schedule changes or additional options. Please note that exchanging dates between individuals is not allowed. If you wish to change your schedule, please make sure to complete your visit by March 31, 2024. If you add an option, you will be responsible for the cost, which you will need to pay at the counter on the day of your visit.
Are there any other important details to know about the medical examinations?

Yes, there are a few important details. Firstly, the test kit will be sent to you approximately 2 to 3 weeks prior to the test. Please check the contents as soon as you receive the materials. Depending on the test, there may be preparations such as dietary restrictions that need to be made up to the day before the test, so please read the instructions beforehand. If you do not receive the materials within 2 weeks, please contact the person in charge of labor affairs. Secondly, if you only receive the medical checkup and do not come to work, please apply for reimbursement of transportation expenses. If you receive the medical checkup in addition to coming to work, please apply for reimbursement of your regular commuting expenses. Finally, the time of the medical checkup is considered working time, so please remember to stamp the time. If you have any further questions, you can contact the person in charge at Monstarlab Inc., Tony Duong.
Thank you for providing the information.
You're welcome! If you have any more questions, feel free to ask. Good luck with the medical examinations!
Can you provide me with information about the medical examinations for Monstarlab Inc. employees?
Sure! Below are the details about the medical examinations for Monstarlab Inc. company employees.
The following medical examinations will be conducted in fiscal year 2023.
All employees are obliged to take the medical examination, so please make your own arrangements and be sure to take the examination.
Employees who are eligible for the medical checkup are those who are employed and covered by social insurance as of the date of the medical checkup.
Part-time workers are also eligible if they are enrolled in social insurance.
If there is a menu for each company, it is described in the guide for each all.
Details of each course can be found at https://www.its-kenpo.or.jp/kanri/keiyaku/ncourse_4.html.
Please note that the age mentioned is the age as of March 31, 2024.
Employees aged 34 and above are required to take the Basic medical checkup.
Employees aged 35 and above are required to take the Health insurance designated checkup.
Female employees aged 30 and above are required to take the Women's medical checkup (cervical cancer, ultrasound, mammogram).
The period of consultation for the medical checkups is from August 2023.
The medical checkups will be conducted at Shibuya Sakura Juji Clinic.
For more information, you can visit their website at https://www.sj-shibuya-clinic.jp/ or contact them at 03-6854-1515.
If you have any inquiries regarding schedule changes and additional options, please contact the clinic directly.
Please note that exchange of dates between individuals is not allowed.
If you wish to change your schedule, please be sure to complete your visit by March 31, 2024.
If you add an option, you will be responsible for the cost of the option, which you will be asked to pay at the counter on the day of your visit.
Regarding the test kit, it will be sent to you approximately 2 to 3 weeks prior to the test.
Please check the contents as soon as you receive the materials.
Depending on the contents of the test, there may be preparations (such as dietary restrictions) that must be made up to the day before the test.
Therefore, please be sure to read the instructions beforehand.
If you do not receive the materials within 2 weeks, please contact the person in charge of labor affairs.
If you only receive the medical checkup and do not come to work, please apply for reimbursement of transportation expenses.
If you are going to receive the medical checkup in addition to coming to work, please apply for reimbursement of your regular commuting expenses.
The time of the medical checkup is considered working time. Please do not forget to stamp your time.
If you have any questions about the medical checkups, please contact the person in charge at Monstarlab Inc., Tony Duong.
Hello, I have some questions about the upcoming medical examinations for Monstarlab Inc. employees.
Sure, I'm here to help. What would you like to know?
When will the medical examinations be conducted?
The medical examinations will be conducted in fiscal year 2023.
Who is eligible for the medical checkup?
All employees who are employed and covered by social insurance as of the date of the medical checkup are eligible. Part-time workers who are enrolled in social insurance are also eligible.
What are the different types of medical checkups available?

There are different types of medical checkups based on age and gender. For employees aged 34 and up, the basic medical checkup is required. Employees aged 35 and above can receive the health insurance designated checkup. Female employees aged 30 and above are also eligible for the women's medical checkup which includes tests for cervical cancer, ultrasound, and mammogram.
When can I consult for the medical checkups?
Consultations for the medical checkups can be done from August 2023.
Where will the medical checkups take place?

The medical checkups will take place at Shibuya Sakura Juji Clinic. Here are the contact details:

Website: https://www.sj-shibuya-clinic.jp/
Phone Number: 03-6854-1515
What should I do if I need to make schedule changes or add options?

For schedule changes and additional options, please contact the clinic directly. Please note that exchanging dates between individuals is not allowed. If you wish to change your schedule, make sure to complete your visit by March 31, 2024. If you add an option, you will be responsible for the cost, which you need to pay at the counter on the day of your visit.
Are there any other important details I should know?

Yes, here are a few other details:

- The test kit will be sent to you approximately 2 to 3 weeks prior to the test. Please check the contents as soon as you receive the materials.

- Depending on the test, there might be preparations such as dietary restrictions that need to be followed before the test. Please read the instructions beforehand.

- If you only receive the medical checkup and do not come to work, please apply for reimbursement of transportation expenses. If you also come to work, please apply for reimbursement of your regular commuting expenses.

- The time of the medical checkup is considered working time. Remember to stamp the time.

- If you have any further questions, please contact Tony Duong, the person in charge of Monstarlab Inc.

For any schedule changes or additional options, you should directly contact the clinic. Please note that dates cannot be exchanged between individuals as it may cause problems for the hospital. Depending on the test, there may be preparations (such as dietary restrictions) that must be made up to the day before the test, so please read the instructions beforehand. Yes, the time of the medical checkup is considered working time. Please remember to stamp the time accordingly.

For any further questions about the medical checkups, please contact Tony Duong, the person in charge at Monstarlab Inc.

Hello, I have some questions about the upcoming medical examinations for Monstarlab Inc. employees.
Sure, I can help you with that. What would you like to know?
Who is eligible for the medical checkup?
All employees who are employed and covered by social insurance as of the date of the medical checkup are eligible. Part-time workers are also eligible if they are enrolled in social insurance.
What are the different menus for the medical checkup?

There are different menus based on the age and gender of the employees. Employees aged 34 and up are eligible for the basic medical checkup. Employees aged 35 and older are eligible for the health insurance designated checkup. Female employees aged 30 and older are eligible for the women's medical checkup, which includes cervical cancer screening, ultrasound, and mammogram.
When is the period of consultation for the medical checkups?
The period of consultation for the medical checkups is from August 2023.
Where are the medical checkups conducted?

The medical checkups are conducted at Shibuya Sakura Juji Clinic. You can find more information about the clinic on their website: https://www.sj-shibuya-clinic.jp/. Their phone number is 03-6854-1515.
What should I do if I need to make schedule changes or add options to my medical checkup?

For schedule changes and additional options, you should contact the clinic directly. Please note that exchanging dates between individuals is not allowed. If you wish to change your schedule, make sure to complete your visit by March 31, 2024. If you add an option, you will be responsible for the cost, which you will be asked to pay at the counter on the day of your visit.
What should I do if I don't receive the test kit or have any issues with it?

The test kit will be sent to you approximately 2 to 3 weeks prior to the test. If you do not receive the materials within 2 weeks, please contact the person in charge of labor affairs. It's important to check the contents of the test kit as soon as you receive it, as there may be preparations or dietary restrictions that need to be followed before the test.
What should I do if I only receive the medical checkup and do not come to work?
If you only receive the medical checkup and do not come to work, please apply for reimbursement of transportation expenses.
What should I do if I receive the medical checkup in addition to coming to work?
If you receive the medical checkup in addition to coming to work, please apply for reimbursement of your regular commuting expenses.
Is the time of the medical checkup considered as working time?
Yes, the time of the medical checkup is considered as working time. Don't forget to stamp the time.
Who should I contact if I have any questions about the medical checkups?
If you have any questions about the medical checkups, please contact Tony Duong, the person in charge at Monstarlab Inc.

- Basic medical checkup: for employees aged 34 and above.
- Health insurance designated checkup: for employees aged 35 and above.
- Women's medical checkup: for female employees aged 30 and above (includes cervical cancer screening, ultrasound, and mammogram).
